name: if destroyed still true
description:
this is a game about you and about the internet. it's a game about how you will always exist, in some form, until the machines shut down.

here is a video of me playing it:

when the above video hits timestamp 1:31, press play on  the music video of the song this game is based on. There are some flashing images in the music video, so open it in a new tab if that might be an issue.

i wrote this game for the record collection 2k21 jam. i hope you enjoy.
